title: ASOS Product Scraper
description: Scrape ASOS product listings using either a search keyword or direct URL. Extract prices, brands, colors, sizes, discounts, and product images from one of the world's leading fashion retailers.

startUrl.title: Start URL
startUrl.description: Direct ASOS search or category URL. If provided, overrides keyword search. Example: https://www.asos.com/search/?q=women+dresses

minPrice.title: Minimum Price
minPrice.description: Filter products with price greater than or equal to this value.

maxPrice.title: Maximum Price
maxPrice.description: Filter products with price less than or equal to this value.

resultsWanted.title: Results Wanted
resultsWanted.description: Maximum number of products to collect.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Proxy settings. Residential proxies recommended for ASOS.
